overview: In a country house, the psychiatrist Daniel, always assisted by his wife and an attendant, starts to treat two new patients. One is Mirian, a middle-class young woman, who arrives there taken by her ex-boyfriend because she is emotionally and erotic out of control after the breakup. The other is Jessica, a transvestite, in existential conflict and distressed by the intense erotic life she is leading.
title: Sex of Abnormals
